INSERT INTO projectStatus (id, project_title, created_by, created_date, project_start,project_end,is_post) VALUES (#{id}, #{projectTitle},#{createdBy},NVL(#{createdDate},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')),#{projectStart},#{projectEnd},#{isPost})
mapper.select: SELECT id, project_title AS projectTitle, created_by AS createdBy, created_date AS createdDate, project_start AS projectStart, project_end AS projectEnd, is_post AS isPost FROM projectStatus WHERE id = #{projectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE projectStatus SET project_title=#{projectTitle}, created_by = #{createdBy}, project_start = #{projectStart}, project_end = #{projectEnd}, created_date = NVL(#{createdDate}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')), is_post = #{isPost} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT N2.* FROM ( SELECT id, project_title AS projectTitle, created_by AS createdBy, created_date AS createdDate, project_start AS projectStart, project_end AS projectEnd, is_post AS isPost, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY id DESC) AS rnum FROM projectStatus N ) N2 WHERE N2.rnum BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
